meanings.definition: A symbol in the form of an equal-armed cross with each arm continued at a right angle, used as the emblem of the Nazi party and as an ancient religious symbol.
meanings.sent1: The museum displayed ancient artifacts adorned with swastikas.
meanings.sent2: The swastikas on the flag represented a dark period in history.
meanings.sent3: During the costume party, someone wore a hat covered in swastikas as a joke.
meanings.sent4: The swastikas of hate were painted on the wall, a stark reminder of intolerance.
meanings.sent5: The intricate design of the swastikas was etched into the stone, capturing attention.

meanings.sent1: The collection showcased various artifacts with swastikas.
meanings.sent2: In the exhibit, the walls were covered with swastikas.
meanings.sent3: The children giggled at the swastikas scattered around the room.
meanings.sent4: The swastikas in the artwork symbolized unity and peace.
meanings.sent5: The repetition of swastikas in the pattern created a mesmerizing effect.
